events.name: Cook Assistant in Nursing Home
events.headerText: Help to prepare and serve meals in a nursing home
longDescription: Hillview Nursing Home are currently looking for a Part-time Assistant Cook.
The tasks include preparation and serving meals to the residents.
No professional chef qualification needed, applicants with an interest in cooking and/or previous catering experience welcomed.
activities: Prepare and serve meals for the residents

events.name: Music club
events.headerText: I'm a really good volunteering event
longDescription: We are looking for people who enjoy working with young people and can share their love for music.
Do you have knowledge of how to use studio equipment or to record music? Would like to share this knowledge? Do you feel you would enjoy working with young people and share your skills with them?

Your role will be to share your musical skill with young people who attend our Music Club. The young people will be in groups according to their ages. There will be a supervisor that will organize all of the activities.
activities: Help children with singing, recording or playing instruments
Guide young people to reach their artistic potential
altPictures: Man helping children play an instrument

events.name: Clean Parks
events.headerText: CleanGreens help local communities to keep green areas clean.
longDescription: CleanGreens has a number of different communities groups operating in environmental related fields. Each month these groups host cleaning events in parks.
Volunteers who join the park cleaning events will be helping the local community remove litter from green areas.
This is a great way to meet new people and have a positive impact on the environment.
activities: Establish groups who form a network engaged in environmental actions
Enhance the value of the green areas in urban spaces

events.name: Food on the street
longDescription: Every Monday we donate 3 hours of our time to people less lucky than us. We buy some food, and we walk around the city to give it to the homeless. It is an always-new experience as you get to know new stories.
This pandemic increased the number of the poor and the snow of January worsened the situation. We want to bring more warm food to the people in need.

You will discover the power of saying to a new friend "Have a good dinner!", "Have a good night!". It's not just a food delivery service. It is an opportunity to meet them and to get to know them better. Join us! It will be fantastic, and you will build strong bonds.
altPictures: Volunteers distribuiting food to homeless people.

events.name: Knit for Homeless Charities
longDescription: If you like to knit and would be interested in supporting people affected by homelessness then we would love to hear from you!
Revived is a community project created in in 2017. The goal is to knit warm clothes for people affected by homelessness and poverty.
Clothes are donated to Homeless charities and organisations to distribute to those that need them most.
activities: Reuse leftovers to knit warm clothes
Learn how to make patterns for a variety of clothing items

events.name: Meals on Wheels
events.headerText: Pick up and deliver meals to people who are not able to leave their homes.
longDescription: Do you have two and a half hours to spare during the week and like to support people in your community?
We are looking for friendly volunteer drivers to help deliver meals to people in their homes. All containers and training is provided.
activities: Deliver meals to people who are not able to leave their homes
altPictures: Man putting a package in car

events.name: Volunteer Gardener
events.headerText: Help with planting and general gardening.
longDescription: Have you got green fingers or interested in learning more about gardening? We are looking for people to get involved with our Cherry Orchard Community Garden.
You will be helping with planting and general gardening. You'll also be meeting new people and being part of a valuable community resource.
activities: Socialize and bond with people while improving your gardening skills
altPictures: A person planting a green plant

events.name: Coach Volunteer
longDescription: We are a Special Olympics bowling club that meet every Thursday.
We are looking for volunteers to help supervise and mentor our athletes.
altPictures: A person wearing a coach T-shirt
